snippet.title: Tricky Super Mario Bros. U - Demo Release Trailer
snippet.description:
The demo for Tricky Super Mario Bros. U, a mod of NSMBU that twists the familiar into a new challenge, is finally here!
Download: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1EF01KAsACwh0aGYuTAEjpY6dRCrbnuU7/view

This demo contains:
- 8 newly revamped levels (all of World 1)
- A completely new soundtrack
- Numerous new backgrounds, tilesets, and other custom visual elements
- The first public usage of Tsuru, a collection of custom code for NSMBU
- And more!

Trailer theme by @AdamCrossing 
Logo by @Rimea, thumbnail by @Dzherbij

NSMBU Modding Discord: https://discord.gg/aZAaXVJ

If you haven't already, be sure to also check out the NSMBU Anniversary Modding Direct, which is where this trailer originally premiered:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vwak5DkfsMw
